name: Naomi Shelton & the Gospel Queens
description:
'''Naomi Shelton & the Gospel Queens''' are an American [[gospel music|gospel]] and [[soul music]] group led by vocalist [[Naomi Shelton]]. Formed in 1999, two of the founding members were from [[Brooklyn]], New York. They have released two albums with [[Daptone Records|Daptone]], ''What Have You Done, My Brother?'' (2009) and ''Cold World'' (2014), both of which charted on [[Billboard (magazine)|''Billboard'']]'s [[Top Gospel Albums|US
Gos]] chart.
